title: Divya Peacock Nakshi Haaram with Emerald Drop - A Majestic Adornment
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
and lustrous freshwater Pearls. Features subtle Ruby accents.
features: This exquisite haaram features a central peacock motif crafted in the Nakshi style, a traditional South Indian technique known for its intricate detailing. The design is enhanced with floral patterns and leaf motifs, all meticulously set with CZ stones to maximize brilliance. A teardrop-shaped Emerald is beautifully suspended below, framed by CZ stones and dangling pearls, adding a touch of royal elegance.
colors: with a vibrant green emerald accent
and the soft creamy hue of freshwater pearls. A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
and other traditional Telugu ceremonies. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of timeless elegance is desired.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and grace. The Emerald adds a touch of royalty and is believed to bring good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and enhances the piece's overall appeal. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
